net.trajano.commons.testing

Class ResourceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.commons.testing.ResourceUtil

  • public final class ResourceUtil
extends Object
    Provides a utility class to load up resource streams.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ResourceUtil()
      Prevent instantiation of utility class.

      • getResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getResourceAsStream(Class<?> clazz,
                              String name)
        Reads a resource as a stream from the the given class' class loader. Callers are expected to close the resource after.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class
        name - name of the resource
        Returns:
        input stream

      • getResourceAsString

        public static String getResourceAsString(Class<?> clazz,
                         String name)
        Reads a resource as a string from the the given class' class loader. Callers are expected to close the resource after. The data is expected to be UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class
        name - name of the resource
        Returns:
        input stream

      • getResourceAsString

        public static String getResourceAsString(String name)
        Reads a resource as a String from the from the context class loader. Callers are expected to close the resource after.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the resource
        Returns:
        string

      • getResourceCopy

        public static File getResourceCopy(Class<?> clazz,
                   String name)
        Creates a copy of the resource from the given class' class loader to a temporary file. It is expected that the test will delete the file afterwards.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class
        name - name of the resource
        Returns:
        temporary file

      • getResourceCopy

        public static File getResourceCopy(String name)
        Creates a copy of the resource from the context class loader to a temporary file. It is expected that the test will delete the file afterwards.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the resource
        Returns:
        temporary file

      • streamToBytes

        public static byte[] streamToBytes(InputStream is)
        Converts an InputStream to bytes. This will not throw an IOException but wraps it in an AssertionError. This reads the InputStream to end of file, but does not close it.
        Parameters:
        is - input stream
        Returns:
        byte array.

      • streamToTempFile

        public static File streamToTempFile(InputStream is)
        Copies the contents of an InputStream to a temporary file. This will not throw an IOException but wraps it in an AssertionError. This reads the InputStream to end of file, but does not close it.
        Parameters:
        is - input stream
        Returns:
        temporary file.
